examples.en: He entered the data into the computer.
examples.zh: 他将数据输入了计算机。

examples.en: They entered the competition last year.
We entered the building through the back door.
examples.zh: 我们从后门进入了大楼。

examples.en: The door was entered by the thief.
The information has been entered into the system.
examples.zh: 信息已经被输入到系统中。
